attributes.action: ONGOING COUNSELLING FOR PRISON INMATES AND REHABILITATION PROGRAMS AND MORE RECOGNITION FOR INMATES WITH MENTAL HEALTH ISSUES
attributes.additional_details: REGULAR COUNSELLING FOR PRISON INMATES T HELP THEM REFORM WHEN RELEASED INTO SOCIETY ,MORE HELP AND RECOGNITION FOR INMATES WITH MENTAL HEALTH ISSUES ,MORE TRAINING FOR THE PRISON OFFICERS AND POLICE OFFICERS IN RECOGNIZING AND DEALING WITH MENTAL HEALTH ISSUES WITH INMATES.REHABILITATION PROGRAMS AND ONGOING AFTER SUPPORT IN REHABILITATING THEIR LIVES .
